name: Marie Fox
summary: Summary Multi-disciplinary designer with a strong marketing and entrepreneurial background. Experienced in leading design projects from start to finish, on time, on budget and with excellent quality. Seeking a creative position working with a top interior designer.

experience.title: Freelance Designer
experience.description: Launched freelance design business specializing in graphic design, interiors, logos, website makeovers, business name generation and marketing. Hired to spearhead interior design of two Eco Chateau wellness spas (opened 2012 & 2014). Developed winning design proposals for unique women's fitness club.

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Imagined and launched design-driven wine brand with an innovative marketing concept. Identified unique market opportunity and positioned the company to fulfill an unmet niche in personalized gifting. Navigated startup stages: crafted business plan, analyzed competitors, researched target markets, set up LLC, obtained licenses, vetted suppliers, sourced wine, conducted tastings, priced products, developed sales channels and marketing strategies. Built website and marketing collateral; hosted 50+ wine events and exported wine to China. Featured in packaging, media and industry outlets.

experience.title: Marketing Manager & Sportswear Product Line Manager
experience.description: Planned large-scale events, delivered presentations to 200+ attendees, oversaw marketing budgets for a $50 Million brand, managed portfolio of professional athletes and media VIPs. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build long-term brand and product marketing plans. Designed and managed events and tradeshow marketing initiatives, coordinated PR with a media agency, directed product launch video, managed web content, and developed new product line strategies from market feedback.

education.degree: BBA in International Business / Marketing (Minor in Spanish)
